text: Kinyarwanda is a 2011 drama film set during the 1994 Rwandan Genocide. It premiered at the 2011 Sundance Film Festival, where it won the World Cinema Dramatic Audience Award. The film is Alrick Brown's directorial debut. ==Plot== A young Tutsi woman and a young Hutu man fall in love amidst chaos; a soldier struggles to foster a greater good while absent from her family; and a priest grapples with his faith in the face of unspeakable horror. ==Cast== * Edouard Bamporiki as Emmanuel * Cassandra Freeman as Lt.
